Special and Continuing Events Calendar
Home
>
Special and Continuing Events Calendar
.page-header
RESERVATION SCHEDULING FOR ALL CAREFREE ACTIVITIES AND MEETINGS
· FILL OUT FACILITY USE PERMIT AVAILABLE FROM THE OFFICE FOR PRIVATE PARTIES. ONCE COMPLETED RETURN TO CINDI HUGHES AT LOT 760 OR EMAIL IT TO HER.
· CONTACT CINDI HUGHES PERSONALLY BY PHONE OR EMAIL TO SCHEDULE MEETINGS OR OTHER ACTIVITIES.
· If your event has been pre-booked and is typed on the calendar, it is your responsibiltiy to contact Cindi Hughes if the time changes or the event is cancelled.
CONTACT: Cindi Hughes, Activity Calendar Coordinator, Lot 760 (651-270-2747) (cjhughes8@msn.com)
Click here to view or download the April Calendar Pages
Click here to View Larger Size Calendar

#primary

#right-sidebar
#content-wrap

Membership
Home
>
Membership
.page-header
Membership has it’s priviledges….
Carefree Country club has many amenities that as members/owners, we all can enjoy.
We have an Active & Affordable lifestyle
Complete Lawn Care Provided
Free Internet Access in the Clubhouse & Golf Center
Garbage Disposal & Recycling facility
Gated Community
Golf Course Included
Large thermal heated swimming pool
Tennis & pickleball courts
Bocce courts
Over 50 Other Activities per week
Active volunteer base
Boat docks and boat launch
Storage Sites for Boats & RV’s and Utility Trailers
Three Thousand Feet of Private Shoreline
And the list goes on and on and on…..

#primary
#sidebar-inner
#right-sidebar

About Us
Home
>
About Us
.page-header
Carefree Country Club is an active 55+ resident-owned gated community located on the shores of Lake Bess in Winter Haven, Florida.
We have been called a “Retirement Gem in Central Florida”
Spend a little time and check us out. We invite you to join us and become our new friends & neighbors.
#content
#primary
#sidebar-inner
#right-sidebar
#content-wrap

Special & Other Events
Home
>
Special & Other Events
.page-header
We never stop at Carefree.. There is always something on the go..
There are special and other events happening every week.
These events include:
Special Events
Movie Nights
Dances
Special Breakfasts
Flea Market
Spring Fling
Fashion Show
Street Dances
Poker Run
Karaoke
Special Dinners
Trivia Night
Holiday Bazaar
Other Events
Line Dancing
Fun Band
Bible Study

#primary
#sidebar-inner
#right-sidebar
